name: Out in the Shed
description:
You play as a game developer that needs to backup their latest game project. However, they left their portable hard drive out in the shed and need to get it. There are two endings as well.

The Naughty Plush poster was done by Espy (@AlexanderBruyns on Twitter)

For more updates from me on games I'm making and more, follow me on Twitter: www.twitter.com/omogonix
